threat_en: Back-end servers used as a means to attack a vehicle or extract data
threat_zh: 后端服务器被用作攻击车辆或提取数据的手段
mitigation_en: Security controls shall be applied to back-end systems to minimise the risk of attack
mitigation_zh: 应对后端系统应用安全控制以最大程度降低攻击风险

threat_en: Services from back-end server being disrupted, affecting the operation of a vehicle
threat_zh: 后端服务器服务中断，影响车辆运行
mitigation_en: Security controls shall be applied to back-end systems to minimise the risk of service disruption
mitigation_zh: 应对后端系统应用安全控制以最大程度降低服务中断风险

threat_en: Spoofing of messages or data received by the vehicle
threat_zh: 欺骗车辆接收的消息或数据
mitigation_en: The vehicle shall verify the authenticity and integrity of messages it receives
mitigation_zh: 车辆应验证其接收消息的真实性和完整性

threat_en: Communication channels used to conduct unauthorized manipulation of vehicle functions
threat_zh: 通信渠道被用于对车辆功能进行未经授权的操控
mitigation_en: Measures shall be in place to detect and respond to unauthorized manipulation attempts
mitigation_zh: 应采取措施检测和响应未经授权的操控尝试

threat_en: Communication channels enable code to be injected/corrupted
threat_zh: 通信渠道允许代码被注入/损坏
mitigation_en: Secure coding practices and code integrity verification shall be implemented
mitigation_zh: 应实施安全编码实践和代码完整性验证

threat_en: Communication channels allow data/code manipulation or replay
threat_zh: 通信渠道允许数据/代码操控或重放
mitigation_en: Anti-replay mechanisms and data integrity protection shall be implemented
mitigation_zh: 应实施防重放机制和数据完整性保护

threat_en: Compromise of update procedures to allow unauthorized software updates
threat_zh: 更新程序被攻陷，允许未经授权的软件更新
mitigation_en: Secure update procedures shall be implemented with authentication and integrity verification
mitigation_zh: 应实施具有认证和完整性验证的安全更新程序

mitigation_en: Measures shall ensure that legitimate updates can be performed
mitigation_zh: 应确保可以执行合法更新的措施

subcategory: Threats relating to unintended human actions
threat_en: Unauthorized internet connection as attack route
threat_zh: 未经授权的互联网连接作为攻击途径
mitigation_en: Access control and network segmentation shall be implemented
mitigation_zh: 应实施访问控制和网络分段

threat_en: Hosted third-party software as attack route
threat_zh: 托管的第三方软件作为攻击途径
mitigation_en: Third-party software shall be assessed and monitored for security risks
mitigation_zh: 应评估和监控第三方软件的安全风险

mitigation_en: Physical interfaces shall be protected against unauthorized access
mitigation_zh: 物理接口应防止未经授权的访问

threat_en: Extraction of copyright or proprietary software from vehicle systems
threat_zh: 从车辆系统中提取版权或专有软件
mitigation_en: Software protection mechanisms shall be implemented

threat_en: Unauthorized access to owner's privacy information
threat_zh: 未经授权访问车主隐私信息
mitigation_en: Data protection and access control mechanisms shall be implemented
mitigation_zh: 应实施数据保护和访问控制机制

mitigation_en: Cryptographic keys shall be protected using secure storage
mitigation_zh: 应使用安全存储保护加密密钥

threat_zh: 未经授权修改车辆数据/参数
mitigation_en: Data integrity protection and access control shall be implemented
mitigation_zh: 应实施数据完整性保护和访问控制
